评论详情: I purchased these sunglasses for myself, male in college, hoping they would fit as it said for men or women in the description. When they arrived, they look just like the images; however, they were much smaller than I expected. The lens were very small and looked to small for my face which is already not very big. These glasses were also too short in the length and barely reached my ears as well as were too small width across my face. The color liked good tho and was what I was wanting and the quality was exactly what I was expecting for the price, nothing too special. I love the style and wish they were a little bigger then I would wear them. I would recommend that if anyone is worried about these being too small either way on you, then probably not buy them.

评论概述: A smaller frame but still cute!
评论详情: I love these, they fight snugly and look cute too. I think the only thing that bothered me was the lens/frames give me somewhat of a blind spot due to the smaller frames. These glasses fit perfectly...they aren't too huge, as most are, or too small. They would fit a normal sized face. They don't seem cheap. I may get a few more pairs in different colors.

These fashionable sunglasses fit perfectly. The retro look is on point right now.  I really  like the way they look and feel. The gray lenses on light gray see-through frames are unique and eye-catching. Very cute, indeed!As for their function, the lenses are on the light side, not a heavy-duty sun shade. I wish they were polarized, though, but for $15 at the time of this writing, I can't complain. Living in a sunbelt, I would have gladly spent a few dollars more for polarization, which cuts the horizontal glare when you tilt your head. (See photo comparing the polarized lenses in my bike shades to the retro shades. I tested them against my LED screen.)  I probably will be wearing these trendy glasses more for fashion than for sports.

I've owned a pair of Sojos before, so I knew the quality would be great.  I think everyone always worries about the FIT when purchasing a pair of sunglasses online.  It's so difficult to know what style will look good with your face shape.  I have a heart shaped face and this style was perfect for me.  The glasses fit my face well, without being so large that they overtake my entire face.  I also noticed how thick the frames are.  It would be difficult to break these, which is a huge plus for me as a mom of a 7-year-old.  I rarely give 5 stars and normally will save 5-star reviews for something I really like.  This is one of those products!  Sojos are at the top of my list when it comes to purchasing sunglasses online!
I love these glasses, the clear frame is very trendy and these are good quality for the price. These do not come with a case but comes well packaged.

评论概述: Solid, quality smaller sunglasses. Not oversized in any way. Nice slate color lenses.
评论详情: I have these Sojos retro round circle style sunglasses in the gray frame, gray lens. They are solidly made and on the smaller side, for smaller faces in my opinion. Unlike many sunglasses, they are not oversized in any way. The lenses are clear and have a nice slate color hue to them. The hinges are solid and frames clear gray plastic. They came with a cloth drawstring pouch and cleaning cloth. Nice shades.
These are really nice glasses. They are a tiny bit on the small side or at least compared to what I’m used to. They are great though!

Nice look to it, shiny frames and inside of the frame looks good too (transparent and you can see the inside metal) Feels a bit on the heavier side, hard and very solid sunglasses. (Seems durable and strong, not sure about how scratch proof the lenses are yet but will update it soon)  Comes with a carrying pouch and lens fabric. Price and quality I’ll give a 4/5.
These frames are too small for my taste. My 8 year old daughter uses them and loves them!

These are very nice sunglasses!  I really like the look and feel of these glasses, I got the crystal grey. Unfortunately, they’re to small for me. I’m 5’-10” and wear a size 7 3/4” hat and these sun glasses are tight to the point of being uncomfortable to wear for driving or walking around. It’s my fault for not understanding the width 137mm is 5.3”.  I really believe these are women sized sunglasses, but it’s advertised for men and women with only one size. So I would only recommend these sunglasses for woman and not a man, unless 137mm width will work for you.

评论概述: Nice sunglasses, great if you have a small face
评论详情: The quality/price ratio is excellent. The frame is thick, sturdy and well constructed. The overall dimensions are as described, so please keep in mind this are more suitable to a small face.  All in all good product.

These glasses came super quickly, and I am surprised at how well made they are.  They feel sturdy and are comfortable on my son's face.  They were well packaged as well, and come with a microfiber cloth for cleaning them, and a pouch to carry them in.  Awesome glasses.
My niece put me on to these Sojos shades and I’m hooked. So fashionable, so stylist, so cute!! I love these!!
The frame is definitely on the small side, but I think I'll still wear them.
I love all the compliments I have received Some told me they loved my shade and I gave it to them and purchase 3 more pair

评论概述: Stylish, Medium Frame, Nice Accessories, NOT POARIZED
评论详情: I ordered these sunglasses because of the translucent blue frames and amber lenses. I also detected that they were not large frames. I was correct on all accounts. I have a "medium" size head for a guy (hat size probably 7-1/2"), so these glasses fit me perfectly. If you have a big head/face, these will look like you are wearing kids glasses. The box they came in was very nice and the glasses included a nice drawstring pouch and lens wipe cloth. The lenses are NOT POLARIZED, which I knew when I ordered them, so note well. The lenses are not dark so they are great for overcast days or low-light situations where you still want some eye protection. Because of the amber hue, they probably help reduce some blue light strain from electronic devices — but don't hold me to that, I am no optometrist — I just know they are comfortable looking through them at my desk top monitor as I type this review!

I have expensive sun glasses that based on past experience I know will soon be lost or misplaced. My more recent solution is to collect cool looking, functional, less expensive glasses. These SOJOS retros are my current favorite. Now, if I can only keep from losing them.

These SOJOS sunglasses are very nice. The UV400 lenses make these sunglasses a must have on a bright day. The frame is plastic making these glasses light weight. SOJOS even hooks you up with a microfiber pouch and glasses cleaning cloth. I definitely recommend these sunglasses. SOJOS Rock!

评论概述: Way better than the sunglasses you get at a gas station
评论详情: My girlfriend and I both love these shades.  We misplace our sunglasses all the time and end up grabbing what ever pair we can find while running out the door.  I usually buy sunglasses at gas stations/CVS/Walgreens as my children are very rough them and break them all the time.  These are by far better quality and in fact feel like designer in my opinion.  The frames feel robust and very solid.  The lenses are brilliant! They are very clear and have a smooth transition from darker at the top to a few shades lighter at the bottom so you can still see your phone or punch in your debt card pin number at the gas station.  They are a bit smaller than I expected but I feel it adds to the retro style.

When I unpacked these glasses, I immediately felt the quality!  The frames are heavy compared to drugstore-purchased sunglasses.  The lenses provide crystal-clear vision too.  The hinges and earpieces even feel high quality folding and unfolding when putting them on and taking them off.  The manufacturer sends a storage pouch for them too so the lenses and frames will stay not only clean yet unscratched through months and years of use.I do have a wide head (as my eye doctors have stated when ordering prescription glasses every year or so).  Thank goodness I started wearing contacts!  That being said, I feel these are a bit tight to wear long-term.  They squeeze the side of my head pretty hard.  I think I look great in them (from the side and from the front) so I'm continuing to wear them in hopes they "spring out" a bit and get a tad looser.  If they do, I can see these being one of my pairs of sunglasses for the next few years.  My fingers are crossed that they do.I may get impatient and slowly start "spreading" them out a bit in hopes they will be perfectly comfortable then.  With their quality, I'll assume they can take that being done to them.  I'll be disappointed in them (and myself) if they can't!  I'll try to update the review later once I've done that.
Most sunglasses are too big for me, so I was thrilled that these fit my narrow face.

评论概述: Nice quality, fair price, very satisfied
评论详情: The hinges have a nice resistance to them and the plastic have a decent weight. Comes with microfiber cloth and drawstring carrying case.  Most sunglasses are made by a single manufacturer, and they’re marked up to insane prices. Because of this, my mind sometimes anchors quality to those high prices. But that’s not true. When sunglasses shopping I try to remind myself that they should be priced around or below $30, especially if they’re not branded. Even at that price point the markup is like 200-300%.  Of course there are poor quality sunglasses, but this pair does not fall into that category.  These feel like if you take care of them, they’ll last.
Returned the item as the glasses were good quality but too small for most adults

I absolutely love these sunglasses, they arrived very fast.  They have an amazing build quality, with great polarization.
